message: Hi Bob, I think an even split is the fairest way to start. What do you think?
I'd like a bit more, 60-40 seems reasonable to me.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. How about a 55/45 split?
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm willing to go slightly above the middle, but this is my final offer.
I'll try one more time, 57-43 is as low as I'm willing to go.
